Option: rename.exclude_file_pattern

This option can be used to exclude all file names matching the specified regexp pattern.

Example of usage in the config.php file:

$mcFileManagerConfig['rename.exclude_file_pattern'] = "/^notthis$|^notthat$/i";

Example of usage in a mc_access file:

rename.exclude_file_pattern=/^notthis$|^notthat$/i

Example of extension in a mc_access file:

rename.exclude_file_pattern=/\.xml$|\.htm$/i
